amendment.description: Amendment moves up the consideration of storm water issues in statewide and metropolitan planning by specifically requiring consideration of projects and strategies that will improve the resiliency and reliability of the transportation system and reduce or mitigate storm water impacts on surface transportation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 35 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to seek to improve highway designs to better manage stormwater by moving up in the planning process from the end so that thought goes into how best to plan design and construct project effectively while also reducing costs.
